Name: assign_story_to_sprint_backlog
Description: Binary variable to decide if a User Story is added to a Sprint Backlog

Name: assign_worker_to_task
Description: Binary variable to decide if a Worker is assigned to a specific Task

Name: set_story_points_for_user_story
Description: Integer variable for estimating the effort for a User Story

Name: set_priority_for_feature
Description: Integer variable to set the business priority for a Feature

Name: select_feature_for_release_plan
Description: Binary variable to decide if a Feature is included in a Release Plan

Name: set_sprint_duration_days
Description: Integer variable to define the length of a Sprint in days

Name: allocate_team_to_project
Description: Binary variable to assign a whole Team to a Project

Name: define_task_effort_hours
Description: Float variable to estimate the effort in hours for a Task

Name: set_project_budget_amount
Description: Float variable to allocate a budget to a Project

Name: choose_worker_role
Description: Categorical variable for assigning a Role to a Worker

Name: update_task_status
Description: Categorical variable for the status of a Task on the Scrum Board

Name: set_team_size
Description: Integer variable to define the number of members in a team

Name: create_blocker_for_task
Description: Binary variable to flag a Task with a new Blocker
